name: What Is Death?
description:
What would you do if you just started a new game that you thought was a first-person shooter, but instead, you were put into a situation where you have been given a gun, and there is a man in front of you talking on the phone to their partner about their daughter's birthday.

Would you be hesitant to pull that trigger?

Please, if you have the time to fill out the feedback form, it would be greatly appreciated.
The feedback form

Who worked on this game:
  • Jacob Ryan - Game design, Programming.
  • Liam Wolfenden - Voice acting, Concepting.
